pages.title: Kamen Rider Durendal
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:saber/devices/royal_sword_of_logos_buckle_durendal)Royal Sword of Logos Buckle (Durendal)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slash$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance III$(li)Haste III$(li)Jump Boost IV$(li)Strength IV
